name: Waterfall
longDesc: You've stumbled upon a large waterfall plummeting from an unseen origin into a fast-moving, underground river and then on further into the distance.  Is that... your helicopter you see?
shortDesc: You stand behind a large waterfall and watch as it becomes a swift river.

shelves.name: Lovely View
shelves.desc: You look out and see your helicopter in the distance among the heavily brushed jungle.

shelves.name: Crack in Cavern Wall
shelves.desc: You see a small, dark crevice that seems to be the perfect place to hide something of value....

doors.name: Slick Stones
doors.desc: You turn back around and look at the slick stones you scrambled across.  Should you turn back?
